alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Richmond (Staten Is.) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 30 at 10:52AM EDT until September 30 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...New York (Manhattan), Richmond (Staten Island) and Kings (Brooklyn) Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EDT today. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. NEW YORK HARBOR AT THE BATTERY NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.0 FT, MODERATE 8.3 FT, MAJOR 9.4 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 3.2 FT, MAJOR 4.3 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/09 AM 6.8/ 7.3 1.7/ 2.2 0.8/ 1.3 1 MINOR 30/10 PM 6.6/ 7.1 1.5/ 2.0 1.0/ 1.5 1 NONE 01/10 AM 6.8/ 7.3 1.7/ 2.2 0.8/ 1.3 1 MINOR 01/11 PM 6.1/ 6.6 1.0/ 1.5 0.8/ 1.3 0-1 NONE 02/11 AM 6.5/ 7.0 1.4/ 1.9 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE 03/12 AM 5.7/ 6.2 0.6/ 1.1 0.8/ 1.3 1 NONE GREAT KILLS HARBOR AT GREAT KILLS NY MLLW CATEGORIES -
